description: Over 70 Million Businesses and Points of Interest
title: Global Places

fields.description: Business/POI name
fields.label: Name
fields.name: name

fields.description: Address number and street name
fields.label: Address
fields.name: address

fields.description: Additional address, incl. suite numbers
fields.label: Address Extended
fields.name: address_extended

fields.description: PO Box. As they do not represent the physical location of a brick-and-mortar store, PO Boxes are often excluded from mobile use cases.
fields.label: PO Box
fields.name: po_box

fields.description: City, town or equivalent
fields.label: Locality (Town/City)
fields.name: locality

fields.description: State, province, territory, or equivalent
fields.label: Region (State/Province)
fields.name: region

fields.description: Postcode or equivalent (zipcode in US)
fields.label: Post Code
fields.name: postcode

fields.description: Authority page (official website)
fields.label: Website
fields.name: website

fields.description: Latitude in decimal degrees (WGS84 datum). Value will not exceed 6 decimal places (0.111m)
fields.label: Latitude
fields.name: latitude

fields.description: Longitude in decimal degrees (WGS84 datum). Value will not exceed 6 decimal places (0.111m)
fields.label: Longitude
fields.name: longitude

fields.description: The Factual ID
fields.label: Factual ID
fields.name: factual_id

fields.description: Telephone number with local formatting
fields.label: Tel
fields.name: tel

fields.description: Fax number in local formatting
fields.label: Fax
fields.name: fax

fields.description: Primary contact email address of organization
fields.label: Email
fields.name: email

fields.description: Category IDs that classify this entity.
fields.label: Category IDs
fields.name: category_ids

fields.description: Category labels that describe the category branch or 'breadcrumb'.
fields.label: Category Labels
fields.name: category_labels

fields.description: Indicates which chain (brand or franchise) this entity is a member of. See documentation for more information on Factual Chains.
fields.label: Chain ID
fields.name: chain_id

fields.description: Label indicating which chain (brand or franchise) this entity is a member of. See documentation for more information on Factual Chains.
fields.label: Chain Name
fields.name: chain_name

fields.description: The neighborhood(s) or other informal geography in which this entity is found.
fields.label: Neighborhood
fields.name: neighborhood

fields.description: Town/place employed in postal addressing. May not reflect the formal geographic location of a place.
fields.label: Post Town
fields.name: post_town

fields.description: Additional sub-division. Usually, but not always, a country sub-division
fields.label: Admin Region
fields.name: admin_region

fields.description: JSON representation of hours of operation
fields.label: Hours of Operations
fields.name: hours
